body_html: That sounds totally logical 👍 . One thing though: I guess the times I re-read the submitted application the most, was between submitting and the application phase was closed. So I'd vote for making the 'copy' accessible right from after the user submitted the final version.

body: That sounds totally logical 👍 .  One thing though: I guess the times I re-read the submitted application the most, was between submitting and the application phase was closed. So I'd vote for making the 'copy' accessible right from after the user submitted the final version.
